project_description: A comprehensive Digital Embedded Wallet Platform providing flexible, multi-app financial transaction solutions with advanced prepaid card management and responsive widget integration capabilities.

journey.user_request: Create a digital wallet platform that integrates with Paysafe API, with both admin and customer interfaces
journey.implementation: Initial setup of the project structure with authentication, wallet API integration, and database schema
key_features_added: Dashboard layouts for admin and customer
journey.notes: Initial setup went smoothly, but user wanted more specific functionality

journey.user_request: Add KYC session creation and contact information management
journey.implementation: Implemented KYC workflows, contact update forms, and improved admin dashboard
journey.notes: Improved satisfaction as core functionality began taking shape

journey.user_request: Create a PhantomPay-Sandbox mock backend that can operate independently
journey.implementation: Designed and built a mock backend system that mimics Paysafe but operates completely locally
key_features_added: Toggle between real and mock APIs
journey.notes: User very satisfied with the mock system that eliminated dependency on external API

journey.user_request: Add budget tracking and analytics features with visualizations
journey.implementation: Created budget tracking system with categories, allocations and animated sunburst charts
journey.notes: Charts initially had performance issues but were optimized

journey.user_request: Implement carbon impact tracking for transactions
journey.implementation: Added system to calculate, track and offset carbon impact of financial transactions
journey.notes: Initial design took too much screen space, needed to be collapsed by default

journey.user_request: Create an embeddable widget system for third-party sites
journey.implementation: Built iframe and micro-widget systems for embedding wallet functionality in external sites
journey.notes: Initial implementation had some styling and authentication issues

journey.user_request: Improve widget styling and create demo sites for partners
journey.implementation: Enhanced widget styling, created gaming and parking demo sites
journey.notes: Demos worked well but widgets needed more customization options

journey.user_request: Add more widget options and improve the badge display
journey.implementation: Enhanced widget capabilities with more display options and improved badge visibility
journey.notes: User was pleased with widget improvements

journey.user_request: Create a drag and drop widget system for the parking demo
journey.implementation: Built a drag and drop system to allow widgets to be placed in different zones
journey.notes: User very satisfied with the flexibility of the widget placement system

journey.user_request: Add new widgets for adding money and prepaid cards
journey.implementation: Created new widgets for adding money to wallet and displaying prepaid cards
journey.notes: Initial implementation needed height adjustments for content visibility

journey.user_request: Create a mobile demo with inline micro-widgets
journey.implementation: Built a mobile-optimized demo with micro-widgets embedded inline with app content
journey.notes: Initial widget height was too small, causing content to be cut off

journey.user_request: Improve widget container heights in mobile demo
journey.implementation: Reorganized mobile demo with taller containers and section headers
journey.notes: User satisfied with the improved layout and visibility of widget content

overall_satisfaction: High - Project evolved from a basic wallet implementation to a comprehensive platform with unique embedding capabilities and partner integrations.
